properties.displayName: Disable Administrative Share Creation at Startup
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000000)" and RegistryKey contains "\\Services\\LanmanServer\\Parameters" and (RegistryKey endswith "\\AutoShareWks" or RegistryKey endswith "\\AutoShareServer")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Administrative shares are hidden network shares created by Microsoft Windows NT operating systems that grant system administrators remote access to every disk volume on a network-connected system
